commit message: Removed 'translateable=false' for some arrays
Ensured that the download UI update handler will terminate. Well - at least it's more robust now :)
Reverted to the use of a normal HashMap for the container of DownloadObservers. The WeakHashMap somehow lost live objects
Initial 'delete when listened' implementation
Mostly refactoring, but also introduced a small hack which fixes the download queue
Refactored the DownloadManager into two files
Fixed some odd strings
Portuguese update and remove source file indent
